title: 怎么让掉在地上的物品马上消失
author: zsciq205

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
首先用脉冲不断激活testfor @e[type=Item] {OnGround:1b}复制代码比较器连接
kill @e[type=Item]复制代码即可
